Asset.Name: Mission Five
Asset.Description: "Espionage" This is the main courtyard, its strewn with munitions and soldiers, looks like a battle took place here recently....probably with those toxic mutants
Asset.ObjectiveMessage: Try To stay alive and get through the courtyard
Asset.CompletionMessage: Now I Have some serious firepower
Asset.DestinationObjectiveMessage: That was close you almost never made it
